channel.title: [Delphi] Alpha transparent PNG as background
channel.description:
Okay, i've finally started coding in delhpi, but i have a serious problem now :P
I made an alpha transparent png in vista style. I want that as background. Well, this happens when the bgcolor is x and transparencykey too.
[img]http://img476.imageshack.us/img476/1986/problemrd8.jpg[/img]
Now, how can i fix this? The pink color should disappear and the background should just be transparent :)
Any suggestions?
Thanks, -S!ms

item.title: [Delphi] Alpha transparent PNG as background
item.dc:creator: @kloplop321 kloplop321
item.description:
@kloplop321 wrote:

well that would be what the system is trying to understand “what the heck are you doing” type of thing. You just need to edit the png in a photo-editing program such as fireworks or photoshop CS

Read full topic
